item.title: ‘The Girlfriend’ Review: Robin Wright and Olivia Cooke Bring Their A-Game to Amazon’s Amusingly Nasty Thriller
item.description: Laurie Davidson and Waleed Zuaiter also star in the six-part miniseries about a wealthy gallerist who grows suspicious of the young woman dating her beloved son.

item.title: TV’s Latest It Brit, Olivia Cooke, Wants to Be Your ‘Girlfriend’
item.description: After skyrocketing to global fame as Alicent Hightower in HBO’s ‘House of the Dragon,’ the star is about to break out big in Robin Wright’s new six-part thriller for Amazon.
